data.Name: Dua Lipa
data.Bio: Born on August 22, 1995 in England, Dua Lipa is the daughter of refugee parents. She was born in London, where she grew up part of her life, but saw everything change when as a child she moved back to her parents' homeland. While still in her teens, she returned to the capital alone, inspired by her singer father to pursue an artistic life. Dua Lipa is writing her name in the music industry, and the numbers can prove it. Dua gained attention from the specialized media as an artist after the release of his debut album in 2017 Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Dua Lipa: The Future Nostalgia Tour
